<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a37ea08d6fc20eb1ef1bfb3ad008261a5af0bccfa4a7bf9c0aaffaf57421effe3f">ARM&#95;AM::ia</a>: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;ia&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00079" /><CodeLine lineNumber="79"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a37ea08d6fc20eb1ef1bfb3ad008261a5a059d1070c4becc8b9584e5719ffd24b6">ARM&#95;AM::da</a>: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;da&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00080" /><CodeLine lineNumber="80"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">case</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a37ea08d6fc20eb1ef1bfb3ad008261a5a2613d8e3d6eaaa6285047725dcc7aa79">ARM&#95;AM::db</a>: </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;db&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00081" /><CodeLine lineNumber="81"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00082" /><CodeLine lineNumber="82"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00083" /><CodeLine lineNumber="83"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00084" /><CodeLine lineNumber="84"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00085" /><CodeLine lineNumber="85"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #1: shift&#95;operand with registers</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00086" /><CodeLine lineNumber="86"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00087" /><CodeLine lineNumber="87"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00088" /><CodeLine lineNumber="88"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This &#39;addressing mode&#39; is used for arithmetic instructions.  It can</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00089" /><CodeLine lineNumber="89"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represent things like:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00090" /><CodeLine lineNumber="90"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00091" /><CodeLine lineNumber="91"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   reg &#91;asr|lsl|lsr|ror|rrx&#93; reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00092" /><CodeLine lineNumber="92"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   reg &#91;asr|lsl|lsr|ror|rrx&#93; imm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00093" /><CodeLine lineNumber="93"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00094" /><CodeLine lineNumber="94"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is stored three operands &#91;rega, regb, opc&#93;.  The first is the base</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00095" /><CodeLine lineNumber="95"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reg, the second is the shift amount (or reg0 if not present or imm).  The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00096" /><CodeLine lineNumber="96"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// third operand encodes the shift opcode and the imm if a reg isn&#39;t present.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00097" /><CodeLine lineNumber="97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00098" /><CodeLine lineNumber="98" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6f904876469fc050db9a5723a79d1200"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6f904876469fc050db9a5723a79d1200">getSORegOpc</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a76f5f9f36bbd9f03c844c5b565f239ef">ShiftOpc</a> ShOp, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00099" /><CodeLine lineNumber="99"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ShOp | (Imm &lt;&lt; 3);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00100" /><CodeLine lineNumber="100"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00101" /><CodeLine lineNumber="101" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0d941a5b2ae5980beb76d03048a24eb3"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0d941a5b2ae5980beb76d03048a24eb3">getSORegOffset</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> &gt;&gt; 3; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00102" /><CodeLine lineNumber="102" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a552f0f6a6cad1279707100bfe7fc3e97"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a76f5f9f36bbd9f03c844c5b565f239ef">ShiftOpc</a> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a552f0f6a6cad1279707100bfe7fc3e97">getSORegShOp</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a>) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a76f5f9f36bbd9f03c844c5b565f239ef">ShiftOpc</a>)(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab471937b9a227e70c7fe8bd9604014d6">Op</a> &amp; 7); &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00103" /><CodeLine lineNumber="103"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00104" /><CodeLine lineNumber="104"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmValImm - Given an encoded imm field for the reg/imm form, return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00105" /><CodeLine lineNumber="105"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the 8-bit imm value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00106" /><CodeLine lineNumber="106" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aa28577d702e2a74b175b2eee75f7efc2"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aa28577d702e2a74b175b2eee75f7efc2">getSOImmValImm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm &amp; 0xFF; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00107" /><CodeLine lineNumber="107"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmValRot - Given an encoded imm field for the reg/imm form, return</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00108" /><CodeLine lineNumber="108"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// the rotate amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00109" /><CodeLine lineNumber="109" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4c3066ac7186d7d02127d1073ca3e1cf"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4c3066ac7186d7d02127d1073ca3e1cf">getSOImmValRot</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &gt;&gt; 8) &#42; 2; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00110" /><CodeLine lineNumber="110"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00111" /><CodeLine lineNumber="111"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmValRotate - Try to handle Imm with an immediate shifter operand,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00112" /><CodeLine lineNumber="112"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// computing the rotate amount to use.  If this immediate value cannot be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00113" /><CodeLine lineNumber="113"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// handled with a single shifter-op, determine a good rotate amount that will</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00114" /><CodeLine lineNumber="114"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// take a maximal chunk of bits out of the immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00115" /><CodeLine lineNumber="115" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00116" /><CodeLine lineNumber="116"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8-bit (or less) immediates are trivially shifter&#95;operands with a rotate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00117" /><CodeLine lineNumber="117"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00118" /><CodeLine lineNumber="118"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Imm &amp; ~255U) == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00119" /><CodeLine lineNumber="119"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00120" /><CodeLine lineNumber="120"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use CTZ to compute the rotate amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00121" /><CodeLine lineNumber="121"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TZ = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00122" /><CodeLine lineNumber="122"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Rotate amount must be even.  Something like 512 must be rotated 8 bits,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// not 9</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00125" /><CodeLine lineNumber="125"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RotAmt = TZ &amp; ~1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00126" /><CodeLine lineNumber="126"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00127" /><CodeLine lineNumber="127"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If we can handle this spread, return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00128" /><CodeLine lineNumber="128"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(Imm, RotAmt) &amp; ~255U) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00129" /><CodeLine lineNumber="129"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (32-RotAmt)&amp;31;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HW rotates right, not left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00130" /><CodeLine lineNumber="130"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00131" /><CodeLine lineNumber="131"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For values like 0xF000000F, we should ignore the low 6 bits, then</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00132" /><CodeLine lineNumber="132"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// retry the hunt.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00133" /><CodeLine lineNumber="133"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm &amp; 63U) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00134" /><CodeLine lineNumber="134"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> TZ2 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Imm &amp; ~63U);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00135" /><CodeLine lineNumber="135"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RotAmt2 = TZ2 &amp; ~1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00136" /><CodeLine lineNumber="136"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(Imm, RotAmt2) &amp; ~255U) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00137" /><CodeLine lineNumber="137"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (32-RotAmt2)&amp;31;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HW rotates right, not left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00138" /><CodeLine lineNumber="138"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00139" /><CodeLine lineNumber="139"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00140" /><CodeLine lineNumber="140"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, we have no way to cover this span of bits with a single</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00141" /><CodeLine lineNumber="141"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// shifter&#95;op immediate.  Return a chunk of bits that will be useful to</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00142" /><CodeLine lineNumber="142"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// handle.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00143" /><CodeLine lineNumber="143"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (32-RotAmt)&amp;31;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// HW rotates right, not left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00144" /><CodeLine lineNumber="144"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00145" /><CodeLine lineNumber="145"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00146" /><CodeLine lineNumber="146"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmVal - Given a 32-bit immediate, if it is something that can fit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00147" /><CodeLine lineNumber="147"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// into an shifter&#95;operand immediate operand, return the 12-bit encoding for</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00148" /><CodeLine lineNumber="148"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// it.  If not, return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00149" /><CodeLine lineNumber="149" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0f3447f06da0010c13eeb865004f71ca"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0f3447f06da0010c13eeb865004f71ca">getSOImmVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Arg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00150" /><CodeLine lineNumber="150"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8-bit (or less) immediates are trivially shifter&#95;operands with a rotate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00151" /><CodeLine lineNumber="151"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00152" /><CodeLine lineNumber="152"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Arg &amp; ~255U) == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Arg;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00153" /><CodeLine lineNumber="153"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00154" /><CodeLine lineNumber="154"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RotAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(Arg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00155" /><CodeLine lineNumber="155"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00156" /><CodeLine lineNumber="156"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this cannot be handled with a single shifter&#95;op, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00157" /><CodeLine lineNumber="157"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, RotAmt) &amp; Arg)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00158" /><CodeLine lineNumber="158"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00159" /><CodeLine lineNumber="159"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00160" /><CodeLine lineNumber="160"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Encode this correctly.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00161" /><CodeLine lineNumber="161"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aef2599d8a5a682c348b25f74051cdb2d">llvm::rotl&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(Arg, RotAmt) | ((RotAmt &gt;&gt; 1) &lt;&lt; 8);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00162" /><CodeLine lineNumber="162"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00163" /><CodeLine lineNumber="163"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00164" /><CodeLine lineNumber="164"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isSOImmTwoPartVal - Return true if the specified value can be obtained by</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00165" /><CodeLine lineNumber="165"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// or&#39;ing together two SOImmVal&#39;s.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00166" /><CodeLine lineNumber="166" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6581a1f491b4f01c6b93d63ea095f5b6"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6581a1f491b4f01c6b93d63ea095f5b6">isSOImmTwoPartVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00167" /><CodeLine lineNumber="167"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be handled with a single shifter&#95;op, bail out.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00168" /><CodeLine lineNumber="168"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00169" /><CodeLine lineNumber="169"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00170" /><CodeLine lineNumber="170"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00171" /><CodeLine lineNumber="171"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00172" /><CodeLine lineNumber="172"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be handled with two shifter&#95;op&#39;s, accept.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00173" /><CodeLine lineNumber="173"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00174" /><CodeLine lineNumber="174"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00175" /><CodeLine lineNumber="175"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00176" /><CodeLine lineNumber="176"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00177" /><CodeLine lineNumber="177"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmTwoPartFirst - If V is a value that satisfies isSOImmTwoPartVal,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00178" /><CodeLine lineNumber="178"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// return the first chunk of it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00179" /><CodeLine lineNumber="179" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#abbbd359eefeb5aed59eecadddd4bf756"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#abbbd359eefeb5aed59eecadddd4bf756">getSOImmTwoPartFirst</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00180" /><CodeLine lineNumber="180"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00181" /><CodeLine lineNumber="181"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00182" /><CodeLine lineNumber="182"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00183" /><CodeLine lineNumber="183"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getSOImmTwoPartSecond - If V is a value that satisfies isSOImmTwoPartVal,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00184" /><CodeLine lineNumber="184"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// return the second chunk of it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00185" /><CodeLine lineNumber="185" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a605dd3e1bea15f2c42b7efa063273e1f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a605dd3e1bea15f2c42b7efa063273e1f">getSOImmTwoPartSecond</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00186" /><CodeLine lineNumber="186"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask out the first hunk.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00187" /><CodeLine lineNumber="187"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00188" /><CodeLine lineNumber="188"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00189" /><CodeLine lineNumber="189"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Take what&#39;s left.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00190" /><CodeLine lineNumber="190"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(V == (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00191" /><CodeLine lineNumber="191"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00192" /><CodeLine lineNumber="192"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00193" /><CodeLine lineNumber="193"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00194" /><CodeLine lineNumber="194"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isSOImmTwoPartValNeg - Return true if the specified value can be obtained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00195" /><CodeLine lineNumber="195"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by two SOImmVal, that -V = First + Second.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00196" /><CodeLine lineNumber="196"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;R+V&quot; can be optimized to (sub (sub R, First), Second).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00197" /><CodeLine lineNumber="197"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// &quot;R=V&quot; can be optimized to (sub (mvn R, ~(-First)), Second).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00198" /><CodeLine lineNumber="198" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5f539636d1f1c4e75b426059664fa022"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5f539636d1f1c4e75b426059664fa022">isSOImmTwoPartValNeg</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00199" /><CodeLine lineNumber="199"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00200" /><CodeLine lineNumber="200"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (!<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6581a1f491b4f01c6b93d63ea095f5b6">isSOImmTwoPartVal</a>(-V))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00201" /><CodeLine lineNumber="201"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00202" /><CodeLine lineNumber="202"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return false if ~(-First) is not a SoImmval.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00203" /><CodeLine lineNumber="203"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#abbbd359eefeb5aed59eecadddd4bf756">getSOImmTwoPartFirst</a>(-V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00204" /><CodeLine lineNumber="204"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a> = ~(-<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00205" /><CodeLine lineNumber="205"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> !(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2c5994cbbea4a8c597898c689d92a5b1">getSOImmValRotate</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>)) &amp; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a9eb4f5b98b70ee4fab9614ed58282c1fa7fb55ed0b7a30342ba6da306428cae04">First</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00206" /><CodeLine lineNumber="206"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00207" /><CodeLine lineNumber="207"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00208" /><CodeLine lineNumber="208"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getThumbImmValShift - Try to handle Imm with a 8-bit immediate followed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00209" /><CodeLine lineNumber="209"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by a left shift. Returns the shift amount to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00210" /><CodeLine lineNumber="210" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aecca4b0d3d0719e4b0eaf0fbe664b853"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aecca4b0d3d0719e4b0eaf0fbe664b853">getThumbImmValShift</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00211" /><CodeLine lineNumber="211"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8-bit (or less) immediates are trivially immediate operand with a shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00212" /><CodeLine lineNumber="212"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00213" /><CodeLine lineNumber="213"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Imm &amp; ~255U) == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00214" /><CodeLine lineNumber="214"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00215" /><CodeLine lineNumber="215"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use CTZ to compute the shift amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00216" /><CodeLine lineNumber="216"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00217" /><CodeLine lineNumber="217"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00218" /><CodeLine lineNumber="218"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00219" /><CodeLine lineNumber="219"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isThumbImmShiftedVal - Return true if the specified value can be obtained</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00220" /><CodeLine lineNumber="220"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by left shifting a 8-bit immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00221" /><CodeLine lineNumber="221" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2cd3a9f6f0047c1989e09ba2e317fe64"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2cd3a9f6f0047c1989e09ba2e317fe64">isThumbImmShiftedVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00222" /><CodeLine lineNumber="222"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be handled with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00223" /><CodeLine lineNumber="223"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = (~255U &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aecca4b0d3d0719e4b0eaf0fbe664b853">getThumbImmValShift</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00224" /><CodeLine lineNumber="224"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00225" /><CodeLine lineNumber="225"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00226" /><CodeLine lineNumber="226"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00227" /><CodeLine lineNumber="227"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getThumbImm16ValShift - Try to handle Imm with a 16-bit immediate followed</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00228" /><CodeLine lineNumber="228"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// by a left shift. Returns the shift amount to use.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00229" /><CodeLine lineNumber="229" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6b588210115f426a0dc1a275bf2a882d"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6b588210115f426a0dc1a275bf2a882d">getThumbImm16ValShift</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00230" /><CodeLine lineNumber="230"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16-bit (or less) immediates are trivially immediate operand with a shift</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00231" /><CodeLine lineNumber="231"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// of zero.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00232" /><CodeLine lineNumber="232"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Imm &amp; ~65535U) == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00233" /><CodeLine lineNumber="233"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00234" /><CodeLine lineNumber="234"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use CTZ to compute the shift amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00235" /><CodeLine lineNumber="235"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00236" /><CodeLine lineNumber="236"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00237" /><CodeLine lineNumber="237"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00238" /><CodeLine lineNumber="238"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isThumbImm16ShiftedVal - Return true if the specified value can be</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00239" /><CodeLine lineNumber="239"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// obtained by left shifting a 16-bit immediate.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00240" /><CodeLine lineNumber="240" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#af77cc47d2681646373c08d84fb562197"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#af77cc47d2681646373c08d84fb562197">isThumbImm16ShiftedVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00241" /><CodeLine lineNumber="241"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be handled with</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00242" /><CodeLine lineNumber="242"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = (~65535U &lt;&lt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6b588210115f426a0dc1a275bf2a882d">getThumbImm16ValShift</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00243" /><CodeLine lineNumber="243"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V == 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00244" /><CodeLine lineNumber="244"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00245" /><CodeLine lineNumber="245"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00246" /><CodeLine lineNumber="246"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getThumbImmNonShiftedVal - If V is a value that satisfies</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00247" /><CodeLine lineNumber="247"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// isThumbImmShiftedVal, return the non-shiftd value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00248" /><CodeLine lineNumber="248" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2b647b539d9f74cb48bbc53b2dac3e03"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a2b647b539d9f74cb48bbc53b2dac3e03">getThumbImmNonShiftedVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00249" /><CodeLine lineNumber="249"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V &gt;&gt; <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aecca4b0d3d0719e4b0eaf0fbe664b853">getThumbImmValShift</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00250" /><CodeLine lineNumber="250"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00251" /><CodeLine lineNumber="251"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00252" /><CodeLine lineNumber="252"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00253" /><CodeLine lineNumber="253"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getT2SOImmValSplat - Return the 12-bit encoded representation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00254" /><CodeLine lineNumber="254"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// if the specified value can be obtained by splatting the low 8 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00255" /><CodeLine lineNumber="255"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// into every other byte or every byte of a 32-bit value. i.e.,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00256" /><CodeLine lineNumber="256"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     0 0 0 abcdefgh    control = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00257" /><CodeLine lineNumber="257"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     0 abcdefgh 0 abcdefgh    control = 1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00258" /><CodeLine lineNumber="258"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     abcdefgh 0 abcdefgh 0    control = 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00259" /><CodeLine lineNumber="259"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///     abcdefgh abcdefgh abcdefgh abcdefgh    control = 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00260" /><CodeLine lineNumber="260"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Return -1 if none of the above apply.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00261" /><CodeLine lineNumber="261"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See ARM Reference Manual A6.3.2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00262" /><CodeLine lineNumber="262" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00263" /><CodeLine lineNumber="263"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> u, Vs, Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00264" /><CodeLine lineNumber="264"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control = 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00265" /><CodeLine lineNumber="265"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((V &amp; 0xffffff00) == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00266" /><CodeLine lineNumber="266"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00267" /><CodeLine lineNumber="267"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00268" /><CodeLine lineNumber="268"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the value is zeroes in the first byte, just shift those off</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00269" /><CodeLine lineNumber="269"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Vs = ((V &amp; 0xff) == 0) ? V &gt;&gt; 8 : V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00270" /><CodeLine lineNumber="270"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Any passing value only has 8 bits of payload, splatted across the word</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00271" /><CodeLine lineNumber="271"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Imm = Vs &amp; 0xff;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00272" /><CodeLine lineNumber="272"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Likewise, any passing values have the payload splatted into the 3rd byte</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00273" /><CodeLine lineNumber="273"><span class="doxyHighlight">    u = Imm | (Imm &lt;&lt; 16);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00274" /><CodeLine lineNumber="274"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00275" /><CodeLine lineNumber="275"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control = 1 or 2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00276" /><CodeLine lineNumber="276"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Vs == u)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00277" /><CodeLine lineNumber="277"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (((Vs == V) ? 1 : 2) &lt;&lt; 8) | Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00278" /><CodeLine lineNumber="278"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00279" /><CodeLine lineNumber="279"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// control = 3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00280" /><CodeLine lineNumber="280"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Vs == (u | (u &lt;&lt; 8)))</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00281" /><CodeLine lineNumber="281"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (3 &lt;&lt; 8) | Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00282" /><CodeLine lineNumber="282"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00283" /><CodeLine lineNumber="283"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00284" /><CodeLine lineNumber="284"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00285" /><CodeLine lineNumber="285"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00286" /><CodeLine lineNumber="286"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getT2SOImmValRotateVal - Return the 12-bit encoded representation if the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00287" /><CodeLine lineNumber="287"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// specified value is a rotated 8-bit value. Return -1 if no rotation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00288" /><CodeLine lineNumber="288"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// encoding is possible.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00289" /><CodeLine lineNumber="289"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See ARM Reference Manual A6.3.2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00290" /><CodeLine lineNumber="290" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4287f784a134193f258e6709d8e6ed21"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4287f784a134193f258e6709d8e6ed21">getT2SOImmValRotateVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00291" /><CodeLine lineNumber="291"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RotAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a66191f0bcc8c62b784819e9e96ceeba2">llvm::countl&#95;zero</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00292" /><CodeLine lineNumber="292"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (RotAmt &gt;= 24)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00293" /><CodeLine lineNumber="293"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00294" /><CodeLine lineNumber="294"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00295" /><CodeLine lineNumber="295"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#39;Arg&#39; can be handled with a single shifter&#95;op return the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00296" /><CodeLine lineNumber="296"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(0xff000000U, RotAmt) &amp; V) == V)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00297" /><CodeLine lineNumber="297"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(V, 24 - RotAmt) &amp; 0x7f) |</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00298" /><CodeLine lineNumber="298"><span class="doxyHighlight">             ((RotAmt + 8) &lt;&lt; 7);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00299" /><CodeLine lineNumber="299"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00300" /><CodeLine lineNumber="300"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00301" /><CodeLine lineNumber="301"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00302" /><CodeLine lineNumber="302"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00303" /><CodeLine lineNumber="303"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getT2SOImmVal - Given a 32-bit immediate, if it is something that can fit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00304" /><CodeLine lineNumber="304"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// into a Thumb-2 shifter&#95;operand immediate operand, return the 12-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00305" /><CodeLine lineNumber="305"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// encoding for it.  If not, return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// See ARM Reference Manual A6.3.2.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a">getT2SOImmVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Arg) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#39;Arg&#39; is an 8-bit splat, then get the encoded value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a766456df1dd21e804cd4596304e10764a5b9bf50c6579a978e5c1104bf8787651">Splat</a> = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(Arg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a766456df1dd21e804cd4596304e10764a5b9bf50c6579a978e5c1104bf8787651">Splat</a> != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a766456df1dd21e804cd4596304e10764a5b9bf50c6579a978e5c1104bf8787651">Splat</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00313" /><CodeLine lineNumber="313"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If &#39;Arg&#39; can be handled with a single shifter&#95;op return the value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Rot = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4287f784a134193f258e6709d8e6ed21">getT2SOImmValRotateVal</a>(Arg);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Rot != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Rot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a14ebcc861ad7837c358e58dc41168798"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a14ebcc861ad7837c358e58dc41168798">getT2SOImmValRotate</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00322" /><CodeLine lineNumber="322"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((V &amp; ~255U) == 0) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Use CTZ to compute the rotate amount.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> RotAmt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a57d2f9ee99e9e68cff564d0d579c8163">llvm::countr&#95;zero</a>(V);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00325" /><CodeLine lineNumber="325"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (32 - RotAmt) &amp; 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00326" /><CodeLine lineNumber="326"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00327" /><CodeLine lineNumber="327"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00328" /><CodeLine lineNumber="328" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aace5db47fb82e762bb6ac3aef10716cb"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aace5db47fb82e762bb6ac3aef10716cb">isT2SOImmTwoPartVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V = Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Passing values can be any combination of splat values and shifter</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// values. If this can be handled with a single shifter or splat, bail</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// out. Those should be handled directly, not with a two-part val.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(V) != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255U, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a14ebcc861ad7837c358e58dc41168798">getT2SOImmValRotate</a>(V)) &amp; V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (V == 0)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this can be handled as an immediate, accept.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a">getT2SOImmVal</a>(V) != -1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Likewise, try masking out a splat value first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><span class="doxyHighlight">    V = Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(V &amp; 0xff00ff00U) != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><span class="doxyHighlight">      V &amp;= ~0xff00ff00U;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00346" /><CodeLine lineNumber="346"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(V &amp; 0x00ff00ffU) != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00347" /><CodeLine lineNumber="347"><span class="doxyHighlight">      V &amp;= ~0x00ff00ffU;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00348" /><CodeLine lineNumber="348"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If what&#39;s left can be handled as an immediate, accept.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00349" /><CodeLine lineNumber="349"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a">getT2SOImmVal</a>(V) != -1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">true</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00350" /><CodeLine lineNumber="350"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00351" /><CodeLine lineNumber="351"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Otherwise, do not accept.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00352" /><CodeLine lineNumber="352"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00353" /><CodeLine lineNumber="353"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00354" /><CodeLine lineNumber="354"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00355" /><CodeLine lineNumber="355" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aa9be15b1cfdccd1e45bcbec61d2f111a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aa9be15b1cfdccd1e45bcbec61d2f111a">getT2SOImmTwoPartFirst</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00356" /><CodeLine lineNumber="356"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aace5db47fb82e762bb6ac3aef10716cb">isT2SOImmTwoPartVal</a>(Imm) &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00357" /><CodeLine lineNumber="357"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Immedate cannot be encoded as two part immediate!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00358" /><CodeLine lineNumber="358"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try a shifter operand as one part</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00359" /><CodeLine lineNumber="359"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a06620855572cf0307aea15a25099df47">llvm::rotr&lt;uint32&#95;t&gt;</a>(~255, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a14ebcc861ad7837c358e58dc41168798">getT2SOImmValRotate</a>(Imm)) &amp; Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00360" /><CodeLine lineNumber="360"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If the rest is encodable as an immediate, then return it.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00361" /><CodeLine lineNumber="361"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a">getT2SOImmVal</a>(V) != -1) </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> V;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00362" /><CodeLine lineNumber="362"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00363" /><CodeLine lineNumber="363"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Try masking out a splat value first.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00364" /><CodeLine lineNumber="364"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(Imm &amp; 0xff00ff00U) != -1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00365" /><CodeLine lineNumber="365"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm &amp; 0xff00ff00U;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00366" /><CodeLine lineNumber="366"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00367" /><CodeLine lineNumber="367"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The other splat is all that&#39;s left as an option.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00368" /><CodeLine lineNumber="368"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a846cf4e09d203a53ff1639aee204c4bb">getT2SOImmValSplatVal</a>(Imm &amp; 0x00ff00ffU) != -1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00369" /><CodeLine lineNumber="369"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm &amp; 0x00ff00ffU;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00370" /><CodeLine lineNumber="370"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00371" /><CodeLine lineNumber="371"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00372" /><CodeLine lineNumber="372" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a785452529e8d32f5611eea90afe4256a"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a785452529e8d32f5611eea90afe4256a">getT2SOImmTwoPartSecond</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00373" /><CodeLine lineNumber="373"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Mask out the first hunk</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00374" /><CodeLine lineNumber="374"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Imm ^= <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aa9be15b1cfdccd1e45bcbec61d2f111a">getT2SOImmTwoPartFirst</a>(Imm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00375" /><CodeLine lineNumber="375"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Return what&#39;s left</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00376" /><CodeLine lineNumber="376"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a> (<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3d6b5f20dd274d971ef924f3e2a29d1a">getT2SOImmVal</a>(Imm) != -1 &amp;&amp;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00377" /><CodeLine lineNumber="377"><span class="doxyHighlight">            </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unable to encode second part of T2 two part SO immediate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00378" /><CodeLine lineNumber="378"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00379" /><CodeLine lineNumber="379"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00380" /><CodeLine lineNumber="380"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00381" /><CodeLine lineNumber="381"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00382" /><CodeLine lineNumber="382"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00383" /><CodeLine lineNumber="383"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00384" /><CodeLine lineNumber="384"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00385" /><CodeLine lineNumber="385"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00386" /><CodeLine lineNumber="386"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for most simple load/store instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00387" /><CodeLine lineNumber="387"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00388" /><CodeLine lineNumber="388"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode2 := reg +/- reg shop imm</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00389" /><CodeLine lineNumber="389"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode2 := reg +/- imm12</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00390" /><CodeLine lineNumber="390"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00391" /><CodeLine lineNumber="391"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first operand is always a Reg.  The second operand is a reg if in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00392" /><CodeLine lineNumber="392"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reg/reg form, otherwise it&#39;s reg#0.  The third field encodes the operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00393" /><CodeLine lineNumber="393"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in bit 12, the immediate in bits 0-11, and the shift op in 13-15. The</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00394" /><CodeLine lineNumber="394"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// fourth operand 16-17 encodes the index mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00395" /><CodeLine lineNumber="395"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00396" /><CodeLine lineNumber="396"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// If this addressing mode is a frame index (before prolog/epilog insertion</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00397" /><CodeLine lineNumber="397"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// and code rewriting), this operand will have the form:  FI#, reg0, &lt;offs&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00398" /><CodeLine lineNumber="398"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// with no shift amount for the frame offset.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00399" /><CodeLine lineNumber="399"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00400" /><CodeLine lineNumber="400" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4164cc05e8f644c324b0ca06f0a3bf68"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a4164cc05e8f644c324b0ca06f0a3bf68">getAM2Opc</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0557608eaebed12bc00812724ba2cd">AddrOpc</a> Opc, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm12, <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a76f5f9f36bbd9f03c844c5b565f239ef">ShiftOpc</a> SO,</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00401" /><CodeLine lineNumber="401"><span class="doxyHighlight">                            </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> IdxMode = 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00402" /><CodeLine lineNumber="402"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(Imm12 &lt; (1 &lt;&lt; 12) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Imm too large!&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00403" /><CodeLine lineNumber="403"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> isSub = Opc == <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0557608eaebed12bc00812724ba2cda41a13f3ce88ed84e63003e32b18c1235">sub</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00404" /><CodeLine lineNumber="404"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm12 | ((int)isSub &lt;&lt; 12) | (SO &lt;&lt; 13) | (IdxMode &lt;&lt; 16) ;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00405" /><CodeLine lineNumber="405"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00407" /><CodeLine lineNumber="407"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> AM2Opc &amp; ((1 &lt;&lt; 12)-1);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00418" /><CodeLine lineNumber="418"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00419" /><CodeLine lineNumber="419"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00420" /><CodeLine lineNumber="420"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00421" /><CodeLine lineNumber="421"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for sign-extending loads, and load/store-pair instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00422" /><CodeLine lineNumber="422"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00423" /><CodeLine lineNumber="423"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode3 := reg +/- reg</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00424" /><CodeLine lineNumber="424"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode3 := reg +/- imm8</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00425" /><CodeLine lineNumber="425"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00426" /><CodeLine lineNumber="426"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first operand is always a Reg.  The second operand is a reg if in</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00427" /><CodeLine lineNumber="427"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// reg/reg form, otherwise it&#39;s reg#0.  The third field encodes the operation</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00428" /><CodeLine lineNumber="428"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// in bit 8, the immediate in bits 0-7. The fourth operand 9-10 encodes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00429" /><CodeLine lineNumber="429"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// index mode.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00430" /><CodeLine lineNumber="430"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00444" /><CodeLine lineNumber="444"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #4</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00445" /><CodeLine lineNumber="445"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00446" /><CodeLine lineNumber="446"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00447" /><CodeLine lineNumber="447"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for load / store multiple instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00448" /><CodeLine lineNumber="448"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00449" /><CodeLine lineNumber="449"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode4 := reg, &lt;mode&gt;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00450" /><CodeLine lineNumber="450"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00451" /><CodeLine lineNumber="451"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The four modes are:</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00452" /><CodeLine lineNumber="452"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    IA - Increment after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00453" /><CodeLine lineNumber="453"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    IB - Increment before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00454" /><CodeLine lineNumber="454"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    DA - Decrement after</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00455" /><CodeLine lineNumber="455"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//    DB - Decrement before</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00456" /><CodeLine lineNumber="456"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// For VFP instructions, only the IA and DB modes are valid.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00457" /><CodeLine lineNumber="457"></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00466" /><CodeLine lineNumber="466"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00467" /><CodeLine lineNumber="467"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00468" /><CodeLine lineNumber="468"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for coprocessor instructions, such as FP load/stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00469" /><CodeLine lineNumber="469"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00470" /><CodeLine lineNumber="470"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode5 := reg +/- imm8&#42;4</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00472" /><CodeLine lineNumber="472"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first operand is always a Reg.  The second operand encodes the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00486" /><CodeLine lineNumber="486"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #5 FP16</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00487" /><CodeLine lineNumber="487"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00488" /><CodeLine lineNumber="488"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00489" /><CodeLine lineNumber="489"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for coprocessor instructions, such as 16-bit FP load/stores.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00490" /><CodeLine lineNumber="490"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00491" /><CodeLine lineNumber="491"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode5fp16 := reg +/- imm8&#42;2</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00492" /><CodeLine lineNumber="492"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00493" /><CodeLine lineNumber="493"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// The first operand is always a Reg.  The second operand encodes the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00494" /><CodeLine lineNumber="494"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// operation (add or subtract) in bit 8 and the immediate in bits 0-7.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00495" /><CodeLine lineNumber="495"></CodeLine>
