<Link id="l00508" /><CodeLine lineNumber="508"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00509" /><CodeLine lineNumber="509"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Addressing Mode #6</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00510" /><CodeLine lineNumber="510"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00511" /><CodeLine lineNumber="511"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00512" /><CodeLine lineNumber="512"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is used for NEON load / store instructions.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00513" /><CodeLine lineNumber="513"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00514" /><CodeLine lineNumber="514"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// addrmode6 := reg with optional alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00515" /><CodeLine lineNumber="515"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00516" /><CodeLine lineNumber="516"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// This is stored in two operands &#91;regaddr, align&#93;.  The first is the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00517" /><CodeLine lineNumber="517"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// address register.  The second operand is the value of the alignment</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00518" /><CodeLine lineNumber="518"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specifier in bytes or zero if no explicit alignment.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00519" /><CodeLine lineNumber="519"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Valid alignments depend on the specific instruction.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00520" /><CodeLine lineNumber="520"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00521" /><CodeLine lineNumber="521"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00522" /><CodeLine lineNumber="522"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// NEON/MVE Modified Immediates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00523" /><CodeLine lineNumber="523"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00524" /><CodeLine lineNumber="524"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00525" /><CodeLine lineNumber="525"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Several NEON and MVE instructions (e.g., VMOV) take a &quot;modified immediate&quot;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00526" /><CodeLine lineNumber="526"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// vector operand, where a small immediate encoded in the instruction</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00527" /><CodeLine lineNumber="527"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// specifies a full NEON vector value.  These modified immediates are</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00528" /><CodeLine lineNumber="528"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// represented here as encoded integers.  The low 8 bits hold the immediate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00529" /><CodeLine lineNumber="529"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// value; bit 12 holds the &quot;Op&quot; field of the instruction, and bits 11-8 hold</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00530" /><CodeLine lineNumber="530"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// the &quot;Cmode&quot; field of the instruction.  The interfaces below treat the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00531" /><CodeLine lineNumber="531"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Op and Cmode values as a single 5-bit value.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00532" /><CodeLine lineNumber="532"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00533" /><CodeLine lineNumber="533" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a586b8fb4f2945716775940f70cc15af1"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a586b8fb4f2945716775940f70cc15af1">createVMOVModImm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpCmode, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Val) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00534" /><CodeLine lineNumber="534"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpCmode &lt;&lt; 8) | Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00535" /><CodeLine lineNumber="535"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00536" /><CodeLine lineNumber="536" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a60bd6c9116ccabdb6ec74c7708c47bf9"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a60bd6c9116ccabdb6ec74c7708c47bf9">getVMOVModImmOpCmode</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModImm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00537" /><CodeLine lineNumber="537"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (ModImm &gt;&gt; 8) &amp; 0x1f;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00538" /><CodeLine lineNumber="538"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00539" /><CodeLine lineNumber="539" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3b853e6b0e974e6683f9c88d7661879f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3b853e6b0e974e6683f9c88d7661879f">getVMOVModImmVal</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModImm) &#123; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModImm &amp; 0xff; &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00540" /><CodeLine lineNumber="540"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00541" /><CodeLine lineNumber="541"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// decodeVMOVModImm - Decode a NEON/MVE modified immediate value into the</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00542" /><CodeLine lineNumber="542"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// element value and the element size in bits.  (If the element size is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00543" /><CodeLine lineNumber="543"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// smaller than the vector, it is splatted into all the elements.)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00544" /><CodeLine lineNumber="544" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a1142830159ad93c394b72a09905a51fd"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> uint64&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a1142830159ad93c394b72a09905a51fd">decodeVMOVModImm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ModImm, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &amp;EltBits) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00545" /><CodeLine lineNumber="545"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> OpCmode = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a60bd6c9116ccabdb6ec74c7708c47bf9">getVMOVModImmOpCmode</a>(ModImm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00546" /><CodeLine lineNumber="546"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm8 = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3b853e6b0e974e6683f9c88d7661879f">getVMOVModImmVal</a>(ModImm);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00547" /><CodeLine lineNumber="547"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Val = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00548" /><CodeLine lineNumber="548"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00549" /><CodeLine lineNumber="549"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpCmode == 0xe) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00550" /><CodeLine lineNumber="550"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 8-bit vector elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00551" /><CodeLine lineNumber="551"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val = Imm8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00552" /><CodeLine lineNumber="552"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EltBits = 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00553" /><CodeLine lineNumber="553"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((OpCmode &amp; 0xc) == 0x8) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00554" /><CodeLine lineNumber="554"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 16-bit vector elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00555" /><CodeLine lineNumber="555"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteNum = (OpCmode &amp; 0x6) &gt;&gt; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00556" /><CodeLine lineNumber="556"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val = Imm8 &lt;&lt; (8 &#42; ByteNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00557" /><CodeLine lineNumber="557"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EltBits = 16;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00558" /><CodeLine lineNumber="558"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((OpCmode &amp; 0x8) == 0) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00559" /><CodeLine lineNumber="559"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-bit vector elements, zero with one byte set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00560" /><CodeLine lineNumber="560"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteNum = (OpCmode &amp; 0x6) &gt;&gt; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00561" /><CodeLine lineNumber="561"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val = Imm8 &lt;&lt; (8 &#42; ByteNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00562" /><CodeLine lineNumber="562"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EltBits = 32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00563" /><CodeLine lineNumber="563"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((OpCmode &amp; 0xe) == 0xc) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00564" /><CodeLine lineNumber="564"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 32-bit vector elements, one byte with low bits set</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00565" /><CodeLine lineNumber="565"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteNum = 1 + (OpCmode &amp; 0x1);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00566" /><CodeLine lineNumber="566"><span class="doxyHighlight">      Val = (Imm8 &lt;&lt; (8 &#42; ByteNum)) | (0xffff &gt;&gt; (8 &#42; (2 - ByteNum)));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00567" /><CodeLine lineNumber="567"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EltBits = 32;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00568" /><CodeLine lineNumber="568"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (OpCmode == 0x1e) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00569" /><CodeLine lineNumber="569"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 64-bit vector elements</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00570" /><CodeLine lineNumber="570"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ByteNum = 0; ByteNum &lt; 8; ++ByteNum) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00571" /><CodeLine lineNumber="571"><span class="doxyHighlight">        </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((ModImm &gt;&gt; ByteNum) &amp; 1)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00572" /><CodeLine lineNumber="572"><span class="doxyHighlight">          Val |= (uint64&#95;t)0xff &lt;&lt; (8 &#42; ByteNum);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00573" /><CodeLine lineNumber="573"><span class="doxyHighlight">      &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00574" /><CodeLine lineNumber="574"><span class="doxyHighlight">      EltBits = 64;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00575" /><CodeLine lineNumber="575"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125; </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00576" /><CodeLine lineNumber="576"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/support/errorhandling-h/#ace243f5c25697a1107cce46626b3dc94">llvm&#95;unreachable</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Unsupported VMOV immediate&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00577" /><CodeLine lineNumber="577"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00578" /><CodeLine lineNumber="578"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Val;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00579" /><CodeLine lineNumber="579"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00580" /><CodeLine lineNumber="580"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00581" /><CodeLine lineNumber="581"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Generic validation for single-byte immediate (0X00, 00X0, etc).</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00582" /><CodeLine lineNumber="582" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#ab8a25efc8e931d4e989a4df264942e99"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#ab8a25efc8e931d4e989a4df264942e99">isNEONBytesplat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00583" /><CodeLine lineNumber="583"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &gt;= 1 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a> &lt;= 4 &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid size&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00584" /><CodeLine lineNumber="584"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00585" /><CodeLine lineNumber="585"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">for</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> i = 0; i &lt; <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/analysis/inlineorder-cpp/#a7ee6f0cb51c3b9056199e9a0001fe8c3a6f6cb72d544962fa333e2e34ce64f719">Size</a>; ++i) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00586" /><CodeLine lineNumber="586"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &amp; 0xff) <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a>++;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00587" /><CodeLine lineNumber="587"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt;= 8;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00588" /><CodeLine lineNumber="588"><span class="doxyHighlight">    &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00589" /><CodeLine lineNumber="589"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#ab1772fd431decccb7926d484ea223db7">count</a> == 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00590" /><CodeLine lineNumber="590"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00591" /><CodeLine lineNumber="591"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00592" /><CodeLine lineNumber="592"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Checks if Value is a correct immediate for instructions like VBIC/VORR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00593" /><CodeLine lineNumber="593" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0abf06ee7ecd205a1faea528698a78"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0abf06ee7ecd205a1faea528698a78">isNEONi16splat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00594" /><CodeLine lineNumber="594"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt; 0xffff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00595" /><CodeLine lineNumber="595"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">false</span><span class="doxyHighlight">;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00596" /><CodeLine lineNumber="596"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i16 value with set bits only in one byte X0 or 0X.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00597" /><CodeLine lineNumber="597"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> == 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#ab8a25efc8e931d4e989a4df264942e99">isNEONBytesplat</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, 2);</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00601" /><CodeLine lineNumber="601" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a1f85a007bf3e4a317a714e2e07680c47"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a1f85a007bf3e4a317a714e2e07680c47">encodeNEONi16splat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00602" /><CodeLine lineNumber="602"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5d0abf06ee7ecd205a1faea528698a78">isNEONi16splat</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid NEON splat value&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00603" /><CodeLine lineNumber="603"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;= 0x100)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00604" /><CodeLine lineNumber="604"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; 8) | 0xa00;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00605" /><CodeLine lineNumber="605"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00606" /><CodeLine lineNumber="606"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> |= 0x800;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00607" /><CodeLine lineNumber="607"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00608" /><CodeLine lineNumber="608"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00609" /><CodeLine lineNumber="609"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00610" /><CodeLine lineNumber="610"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Checks if Value is a correct immediate for instructions like VBIC/VORR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00611" /><CodeLine lineNumber="611" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6bfe2dce3ac76bfe25bd3ec43de6da8f"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">bool</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6bfe2dce3ac76bfe25bd3ec43de6da8f">isNEONi32splat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00612" /><CodeLine lineNumber="612"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// i32 value with set bits only in one byte X000, 0X00, 00X0, or 000X.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00613" /><CodeLine lineNumber="613"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> == 0 || <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#ab8a25efc8e931d4e989a4df264942e99">isNEONBytesplat</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>, 4);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00614" /><CodeLine lineNumber="614"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00615" /><CodeLine lineNumber="615"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00616" /><CodeLine lineNumber="616"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// Encode NEON 32 bits Splat immediate for instructions like VBIC/VORR.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00617" /><CodeLine lineNumber="617" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aab5a8f472308dc5564856a478b255df8"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#aab5a8f472308dc5564856a478b255df8">encodeNEONi32splat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00618" /><CodeLine lineNumber="618"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(<a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6bfe2dce3ac76bfe25bd3ec43de6da8f">isNEONi32splat</a>(<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>) &amp;&amp; </span><span class="doxyHighlightStringLiteral">&quot;Invalid NEON splat value&quot;</span><span class="doxyHighlight">);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00619" /><CodeLine lineNumber="619"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;= 256 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt;= 0xff00)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00620" /><CodeLine lineNumber="620"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; 8) | 0x200;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00621" /><CodeLine lineNumber="621"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt; 65535 &amp;&amp; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &lt;= 0xff0000)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00622" /><CodeLine lineNumber="622"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; 16) | 0x400;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00623" /><CodeLine lineNumber="623"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">else</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt; 0xffffff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00624" /><CodeLine lineNumber="624"><span class="doxyHighlight">      <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> = (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> &gt;&gt; 24) | 0x600;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00625" /><CodeLine lineNumber="625"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a>;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00626" /><CodeLine lineNumber="626"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00627" /><CodeLine lineNumber="627"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00628" /><CodeLine lineNumber="628"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//===--------------------------------------------------------------------===//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00629" /><CodeLine lineNumber="629"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// Floating-point Immediates</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00630" /><CodeLine lineNumber="630"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00631" /><CodeLine lineNumber="631" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3c2b7ef9a32efac90cfa7257fbb2ee52"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">float</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a3c2b7ef9a32efac90cfa7257fbb2ee52">getFPImmFloat</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">unsigned</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00632" /><CodeLine lineNumber="632"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We expect an 8-bit binary encoding of a floating-point number here.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00633" /><CodeLine lineNumber="633"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00634" /><CodeLine lineNumber="634"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t Sign = (Imm &gt;&gt; 7) &amp; 0x1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00635" /><CodeLine lineNumber="635"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t Exp = (Imm &gt;&gt; 4) &amp; 0x7;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00636" /><CodeLine lineNumber="636"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint8&#95;t Mantissa = Imm &amp; 0xf;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00637" /><CodeLine lineNumber="637"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00638" /><CodeLine lineNumber="638"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   8-bit FP    IEEE Float Encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00639" /><CodeLine lineNumber="639"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//   abcd efgh   aBbbbbbc defgh000 0 0</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00640" /><CodeLine lineNumber="640"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">//</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00641" /><CodeLine lineNumber="641"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// where B = NOT(b);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00642" /><CodeLine lineNumber="642"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> = 0;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00643" /><CodeLine lineNumber="643"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= Sign &lt;&lt; 31;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00644" /><CodeLine lineNumber="644"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= ((Exp &amp; 0x4) != 0 ? 0 : 1) &lt;&lt; 30;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00645" /><CodeLine lineNumber="645"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= ((Exp &amp; 0x4) != 0 ? 31 : 0) &lt;&lt; 25;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00646" /><CodeLine lineNumber="646"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= (Exp &amp; 0x3) &lt;&lt; 23;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00647" /><CodeLine lineNumber="647"><span class="doxyHighlight">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a> |= Mantissa &lt;&lt; 19;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00648" /><CodeLine lineNumber="648"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#aab3863f16cb0767af49f0dd63bc5aa90">bit&#95;cast&lt;float&gt;</a>(<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/support/md5-cpp/#ac0eafdc9ee161b71e7af98af736952fd">I</a>);</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00649" /><CodeLine lineNumber="649"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00650" /><CodeLine lineNumber="650"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00651" /><CodeLine lineNumber="651"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getFP16Imm - Return an 8-bit floating-point version of the 16-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00652" /><CodeLine lineNumber="652"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value. If the value cannot be represented as an 8-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00653" /><CodeLine lineNumber="653"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value, then return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00654" /><CodeLine lineNumber="654" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6d6612ebe88f532f464ff1275ed58d1b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6d6612ebe88f532f464ff1275ed58d1b">getFP16Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00655" /><CodeLine lineNumber="655"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t Sign = Imm.lshr(15).getZExtValue() &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00656" /><CodeLine lineNumber="656"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int32&#95;t Exp = (Imm.lshr(10).getSExtValue() &amp; 0x1f) - 15;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -14 to 15</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00657" /><CodeLine lineNumber="657"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Mantissa = Imm.getZExtValue() &amp; 0x3ff;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 10 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00658" /><CodeLine lineNumber="658"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00659" /><CodeLine lineNumber="659"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 4 bits of mantissa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00660" /><CodeLine lineNumber="660"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mantissa = (16+UInt(e:f:g:h))/16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00661" /><CodeLine lineNumber="661"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Mantissa &amp; 0x3f)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00662" /><CodeLine lineNumber="662"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00663" /><CodeLine lineNumber="663"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mantissa &gt;&gt;= 6;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00664" /><CodeLine lineNumber="664"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00665" /><CodeLine lineNumber="665"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 3 bits of exponent: exp == UInt(NOT(b):c:d)-3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00666" /><CodeLine lineNumber="666"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Exp &lt; -3 || Exp &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00667" /><CodeLine lineNumber="667"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00668" /><CodeLine lineNumber="668"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Exp = ((Exp+3) &amp; 0x7) ^ 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00669" /><CodeLine lineNumber="669"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00670" /><CodeLine lineNumber="670"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Sign &lt;&lt; 7) | (Exp &lt;&lt; 4) | Mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00671" /><CodeLine lineNumber="671"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00672" /><CodeLine lineNumber="672"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00673" /><CodeLine lineNumber="673" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a175cfb35ded324792e79b99f0f26788b"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6d6612ebe88f532f464ff1275ed58d1b">getFP16Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;FPImm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00674" /><CodeLine lineNumber="674"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6d6612ebe88f532f464ff1275ed58d1b">getFP16Imm</a>(FPImm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a9c5a2112c559ffbe2c7bbf5698b6482f">bitcastToAPInt</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00675" /><CodeLine lineNumber="675"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00676" /><CodeLine lineNumber="676"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00677" /><CodeLine lineNumber="677"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// If this is a FP16Imm encoded as a fp32 value, return the 8-bit encoding</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00678" /><CodeLine lineNumber="678"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// for it. Otherwise return -1 like getFP16Imm.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00679" /><CodeLine lineNumber="679" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a9ee19d38a1e1584e356c193d30417733"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a9ee19d38a1e1584e356c193d30417733">getFP32FP16Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00680" /><CodeLine lineNumber="680"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Imm.getActiveBits() &gt; 16)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00681" /><CodeLine lineNumber="681"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00682" /><CodeLine lineNumber="682"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a6d6612ebe88f532f464ff1275ed58d1b">ARM&#95;AM::getFP16Imm</a>(Imm.trunc(16));</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00683" /><CodeLine lineNumber="683"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00684" /><CodeLine lineNumber="684"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00685" /><CodeLine lineNumber="685" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a802e2c223f77ddcaa043fdb8aea8f0db"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a9ee19d38a1e1584e356c193d30417733">getFP32FP16Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;FPImm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00686" /><CodeLine lineNumber="686"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a9ee19d38a1e1584e356c193d30417733">getFP32FP16Imm</a>(FPImm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a9c5a2112c559ffbe2c7bbf5698b6482f">bitcastToAPInt</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00687" /><CodeLine lineNumber="687"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00688" /><CodeLine lineNumber="688"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00689" /><CodeLine lineNumber="689"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getFP32Imm - Return an 8-bit floating-point version of the 32-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00690" /><CodeLine lineNumber="690"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value. If the value cannot be represented as an 8-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00691" /><CodeLine lineNumber="691"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value, then return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00692" /><CodeLine lineNumber="692" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0ff84c673da1cdc12d7061d663a686a5"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0ff84c673da1cdc12d7061d663a686a5">getFP32Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00693" /><CodeLine lineNumber="693"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint32&#95;t Sign = Imm.lshr(31).getZExtValue() &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00694" /><CodeLine lineNumber="694"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int32&#95;t Exp = (Imm.lshr(23).getSExtValue() &amp; 0xff) - 127;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -126 to 127</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00695" /><CodeLine lineNumber="695"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Mantissa = Imm.getZExtValue() &amp; 0x7fffff;  </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// 23 bits</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00696" /><CodeLine lineNumber="696"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00697" /><CodeLine lineNumber="697"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 4 bits of mantissa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00698" /><CodeLine lineNumber="698"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mantissa = (16+UInt(e:f:g:h))/16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00699" /><CodeLine lineNumber="699"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Mantissa &amp; 0x7ffff)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00700" /><CodeLine lineNumber="700"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00701" /><CodeLine lineNumber="701"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mantissa &gt;&gt;= 19;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00702" /><CodeLine lineNumber="702"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Mantissa &amp; 0xf) != Mantissa)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00703" /><CodeLine lineNumber="703"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00704" /><CodeLine lineNumber="704"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00705" /><CodeLine lineNumber="705"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 3 bits of exponent: exp == UInt(NOT(b):c:d)-3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00706" /><CodeLine lineNumber="706"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Exp &lt; -3 || Exp &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00707" /><CodeLine lineNumber="707"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00708" /><CodeLine lineNumber="708"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Exp = ((Exp+3) &amp; 0x7) ^ 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00709" /><CodeLine lineNumber="709"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00710" /><CodeLine lineNumber="710"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Sign &lt;&lt; 7) | (Exp &lt;&lt; 4) | Mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00711" /><CodeLine lineNumber="711"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00712" /><CodeLine lineNumber="712"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00713" /><CodeLine lineNumber="713" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a7216473d5bb804df4df6141438c8c5ce"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0ff84c673da1cdc12d7061d663a686a5">getFP32Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat">APFloat</a> &amp;FPImm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00714" /><CodeLine lineNumber="714"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a0ff84c673da1cdc12d7061d663a686a5">getFP32Imm</a>(FPImm.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apfloat/#a9c5a2112c559ffbe2c7bbf5698b6482f">bitcastToAPInt</a>());</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00715" /><CodeLine lineNumber="715"><span class="doxyHighlight">  &#125;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00716" /><CodeLine lineNumber="716"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00717" /><CodeLine lineNumber="717"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// getFP64Imm - Return an 8-bit floating-point version of the 64-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00718" /><CodeLine lineNumber="718"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value. If the value cannot be represented as an 8-bit</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00719" /><CodeLine lineNumber="719"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// floating-point value, then return -1</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00720" /><CodeLine lineNumber="720" lineLink="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5b469aea8a344952b8effedd56336182"><span class="doxyHighlight">  </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">inline</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/arm-am/#a5b469aea8a344952b8effedd56336182">getFP64Imm</a>(</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">const</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/apint">APInt</a> &amp;Imm) &#123;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00721" /><CodeLine lineNumber="721"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Sign = Imm.lshr(63).getZExtValue() &amp; 1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00722" /><CodeLine lineNumber="722"><span class="doxyHighlight">    int64&#95;t Exp = (Imm.lshr(52).getSExtValue() &amp; 0x7ff) - 1023; </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// -1022 to 1023</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00723" /><CodeLine lineNumber="723"><span class="doxyHighlight">    uint64&#95;t Mantissa = Imm.getZExtValue() &amp; 0xfffffffffffffULL;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00724" /><CodeLine lineNumber="724"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00725" /><CodeLine lineNumber="725"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 4 bits of mantissa.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00726" /><CodeLine lineNumber="726"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// mantissa = (16+UInt(e:f:g:h))/16.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00727" /><CodeLine lineNumber="727"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Mantissa &amp; 0xffffffffffffULL)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00728" /><CodeLine lineNumber="728"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00729" /><CodeLine lineNumber="729"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Mantissa &gt;&gt;= 48;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00730" /><CodeLine lineNumber="730"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((Mantissa &amp; 0xf) != Mantissa)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00731" /><CodeLine lineNumber="731"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00732" /><CodeLine lineNumber="732"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00733" /><CodeLine lineNumber="733"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightComment">// We can handle 3 bits of exponent: exp == UInt(NOT(b):c:d)-3</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00734" /><CodeLine lineNumber="734"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">if</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> (Exp &lt; -3 || Exp &gt; 4)</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00735" /><CodeLine lineNumber="735"><span class="doxyHighlight">      </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> -1;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00736" /><CodeLine lineNumber="736"><span class="doxyHighlight">    Exp = ((Exp+3) &amp; 0x7) ^ 4;</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00737" /><CodeLine lineNumber="737"></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00738" /><CodeLine lineNumber="738"><span class="doxyHighlight">    </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordFlow">return</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> ((</span><span class="doxyHighlightKeywordType">int</span><span class="doxyHighlight">)Sign &lt;&lt; 7) | (Exp &lt;&lt; 4) | Mantissa;</span></CodeLine>
